name: Tribal Trap
description:
Game project for BUG Fall Jam 2020. Jam's theme was "We'll be back".  

In Tribal trap, player controls a ship and trying to escape from one island to another. While trying to reach to the island, player must defeat the sea monsters. When you reach to the island,  you complete the level. Ship goes back to the starting island and lose a skill in each level. Player must defeat the sea monsters with lesser skills in each level.

TEAM

Art : Gülten Yüzükırmızı

Development : Umut Zenger, Meriç Özer

Desing : Fatih Seyfullah Kılıç, Kürşat Kahraman
